actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from levy for the collection of taxes certain property which is used by the taxpayer as his principal residence and is used in a trade or business and to increase the exemption from levy for books and tools in a trade or business.

summary.text: Exempts from levy for the collection of taxes under the Internal Revenue Code any building or structure which is used by the taxpayer as his principal residence and is used in a trade or business. Increases the exemption from levy for books and tools and used in a trade or business.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from levy for the collection of taxes certain property which is used by the taxpayer as his principal residence and is used in a trade or business and to increase the exemption from levy for books and tools in a trade or business.
